original_text: For he performeth the thing that is appointed for me: and many such things are with him.
korean_text: 그런즉 내게 작정하신 것을 이루실 것이라 이런 일이 그에게 많이 있느니라

sentences.original_text: the thing that is appointed for me
and many such things are with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 많은 이런 것들이 그와 함께 있느니라
